Documents has improved the Resize and Compression functionality and includes the following changes:

- You now specify the real hard copy page dimensions which we provide in terms of A2, A3, A4 and A5 pages

MACOS
- Documents is now available on macOS which supports all the features except scanning and will be available for download on the Mac App Store soon.

DARK MODE
- Dark mode is now supported on iOS, iPadOS and macOS.
